filmography.title: The Get-Away
filmography.role_description: The sister of a gangster who helps an undercover G-Man; Reed's film debut.
filmography.plot: A G-Man goes undercover in prison to orchestrate a breakout with a gangster to find the rest of his gang.

filmography.title: Shadow of the Thin Man
filmography.role_description: The girlfriend of a jockey accused of murder, who seeks help from Nick and Nora Charles.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora Charles investigate a murder at a racetrack that is linked to a gambling syndicate.

filmography.title: The Courtship of Andy Hardy
filmography.role_description: A young woman caught in her parents' divorce who becomes the object of Andy Hardy's affection.
filmography.plot: Judge Hardy takes on a divorce case while Andy tries to help the couple's daughter adjust to the situation.

filmography.title: Calling Dr. Gillespie
filmography.role_description: A wealthy socialite whose engagement to a young doctor is threatened by a psychotic killer.
filmography.plot: Dr. Gillespie mentors a young doctor whose fiancée is targeted by a homicidal patient.

filmography.title: Eyes in the Night
filmography.role_description: The defiant stepdaughter of a wealthy woman, who inadvertently aids Nazi spies.
filmography.plot: A blind detective investigates a murder at a country estate where Nazi spies are hiding.

filmography.title: The Human Comedy
filmography.role_description: The gentle and supportive daughter of the Macauley family in WWII-era California.
filmography.plot: A teenage telegram messenger in a small California town during WWII learns about life and loss as he delivers messages.

filmography.title: The Man from Down Under
filmography.role_description: An orphan raised by an Australian soldier who is unaware of her true parentage.
filmography.plot: An Australian WWI veteran raises two war orphans who fall in love, not knowing they are not siblings.

filmography.title: See Here, Private Hargrove
filmography.role_description: The girlfriend of a bumbling reporter turned soldier in this hit wartime comedy.
filmography.plot: A reporter drafted into the army struggles with military life and tries to capitalize on his experiences.

filmography.title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
filmography.role_description: The innocent niece of the painter Basil Hallward who falls for the eternally young Dorian Gray.
filmography.plot: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty eternally, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

filmography.title: They Were Expendable
filmography.role_description: An Army nurse in the Philippines who shares a poignant, understated romance with John Wayne's character.
filmography.plot: A story of the PT Boat squadrons in the Philippines during World War II.

filmography.title: It's a Wonderful Life
filmography.role_description: The devoted and loving wife of George Bailey, whose steadfast support anchors the film's emotional core.
filmography.plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

filmography.title: Green Dolphin Street
filmography.role_description: A woman who loses the man she loves to her sister due to a mix-up but remains devoted to her family.
filmography.plot: A man writes to the wrong sister proposing marriage, leading to a complicated life in pioneer New Zealand.

filmography.title: Chicago Deadline
filmography.role_description: A tragic young woman whose death sparks an investigation by a reporter who becomes obsessed with her past.
filmography.plot: A reporter investigates the death of a young woman by tracking down the names listed in her little black book.

filmography.title: Saturday's Hero
filmography.role_description: The wealthy, troubled niece of a college booster who falls for a football player.
filmography.plot: A high school football star gets a scholarship to a prestigious southern university, only to find corruption and exploitation.

filmography.title: Scandal Sheet
filmography.role_description: A feature writer at a tabloid newspaper who unknowingly investigates her own editor for murder.
filmography.plot: An ambitious reporter and a feature writer investigate a murder, unaware that their editor is the killer.

filmography.title: Hangman's Knot
filmography.role_description: A former army nurse held hostage by Confederate soldiers who develops a bond with their leader.
filmography.plot: Confederate soldiers ambush a Union gold shipment, unaware the war has ended, and are trapped by a posse.

filmography.title: Trouble Along the Way
filmography.role_description: A strict social worker investigating the custody of a football coach's daughter, who eventually softens toward him.
filmography.plot: A college facing closure hires a disgraced football coach to build a winning team and save the school.

filmography.title: The Caddy
filmography.role_description: A wealthy socialite who becomes the romantic interest of Dean Martin's character in this Martin and Lewis comedy.
filmography.plot: A skilled golfer with a fear of crowds coaches his friend to success, leading to a chaotic partnership.

filmography.title: From Here to Eternity
filmography.role_description: A nightclub hostess who dreams of a respectable life and falls for a soldier, showcasing Reed's dramatic depth.
filmography.plot: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing in his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

filmography.title: Gun Fury
filmography.role_description: A woman kidnapped by outlaws in the Old West, prompting her fiancé to pursue them.
filmography.plot: After a stagecoach robbery, a man pursues the gang that kidnapped his fiancée.

filmography.title: The Last Time I Saw Paris
filmography.role_description: The sensible sister of Elizabeth Taylor's character, who quietly loves the protagonist from afar.
filmography.plot: An American writer recalls his turbulent marriage to a wealthy girl in post-WWII Paris.

filmography.title: Three Hours to Kill
filmography.role_description: A woman caught between her past love for a man accused of murder and her current life.
filmography.plot: A man wrongly accused of murder returns to his hometown to find the real killer before the sheriff catches him.

filmography.title: They Rode West
filmography.role_description: The niece of a post commander who falls for a doctor dedicated to treating Native Americans.
filmography.plot: A cavalry doctor is ostracized for treating sick Kiowa Indians against orders.

filmography.title: The Far Horizons
filmography.role_description: A controversial casting as the Shoshone guide who leads the Lewis and Clark expedition.
filmography.plot: A fictionalized account of the Lewis and Clark expedition and their guide Sacagawea.

filmography.title: The Benny Goodman Story
filmography.role_description: A society woman who marries the famous clarinetist and bandleader Benny Goodman.
filmography.plot: The life and career of jazz clarinetist Benny Goodman, from his Chicago roots to his historic Carnegie Hall concert.

filmography.title: Ransom!
filmography.role_description: The distraught wife of a businessman who makes the controversial decision not to pay their son's kidnappers.
filmography.plot: A wealthy man's son is kidnapped, and he shocks the nation by refusing to pay the ransom, instead offering it as a bounty.

filmography.title: Backlash
filmography.role_description: A woman searching for gold and the truth about her husband's death in the aftermath of an Apache massacre.
filmography.plot: A gunman searching for the man who betrayed five men in an Apache raid meets a woman with her own agenda.

filmography.title: The Whole Truth
filmography.role_description: The wife of a movie producer who gets caught up in a murder plot on the French Riviera.
filmography.plot: A producer is accused of murdering his leading lady, and his wife must help clear his name.

filmography.title: Pepe
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as herself in this star-studded musical comedy.
filmography.plot: A Mexican ranch hand travels to Hollywood to retrieve his beloved horse, encountering numerous celebrities along the way.
